name: Cocoa Lip Balm
shortDescription: Gently apply on lips using your fingertips and evenly spread throughout. Best results when used after Fascinatingly Dark LIP SCRUB.
fullDescription: Fascinatingly Dark lip balms are made with 100% natural ingredients .Keeps your lips moisturised.Protects lips from harmful external factors.It helps soften the lIps.
